00019 #ifndef _COPPERPLATE_CLOCKOBJ_H
00020 #define _COPPERPLATE_CLOCKOBJ_H
00021 
00022 #include <pthread.h>
00023 #include <time.h>
00024 #include <xeno_config.h>
00025 #include <copperplate/list.h>
00026 #include <copperplate/debug.h>
00027 #include <copperplate/lock.h>
00028 
00029 typedef unsigned long long ticks_t;
00030 
00031 typedef long long sticks_t;
00032 
00033 /*
00034  * We define the Copperplate clock as a monotonic, non-adjustable
00035  * one. This means that delays and timeouts won't be affected when the
00036  * kernel host date is changed. The implementation provides support
00037  * for absolute dates internally, with a per-clock epoch value, so
00038  * that different emulators can have different system dates.
00039  */
00040 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_RAW_CLOCK_ENABLED
00041 #define CLOCK_COPPERPLATE  CLOCK_MONOTONIC_RAW
00042 #else
00043 #define CLOCK_COPPERPLATE  CLOCK_MONOTONIC
00044 #endif
00045 
00046 struct clockobj {
00047         pthread_mutex_t lock;
00048         struct timespec epoch;
00049         struct timespec offset;
00050 #ifndef CONFIG_XENO_LORES_CLOCK_DISABLED
00051         unsigned int resolution;
00052         unsigned int frequency;
00053 #endif
00054         const char *name;       /* __ref FIXME */
00055 };
00056 
00057 void timespec_sub(struct timespec *__restrict r,
00058                   const struct timespec *__restrict t1,
00059                   const struct timespec *__restrict t2);
00060 
00061 void timespec_subs(struct timespec *__restrict r,
00062                    const struct timespec *__restrict t1,
00063                    sticks_t t2);
00064 
00065 void timespec_add(struct timespec *__restrict r,
00066                   const struct timespec *__restrict t1,
00067                   const struct timespec *__restrict t2);
00068 
00069 void timespec_adds(struct timespec *__restrict r,
00070                    const struct timespec *__restrict t1,
00071                    sticks_t t2);
00072 
00073 static inline sticks_t timespec_scalar(const struct timespec *__restrict t)
00074 {
00075         return t->tv_sec * 1000000000LL + t->tv_nsec;
00076 }
00077 
00078 static inline int __attribute__ ((always_inline))
00079 timespec_before(const struct timespec *__restrict t1,
00080                 const struct timespec *__restrict t2)
00081 {
00082         if (t1->tv_sec < t2->tv_sec)
00083                 return 1;
00084 
00085         if (t1->tv_sec == t2->tv_sec &&
00086             t1->tv_nsec < t2->tv_nsec)
00087                 return 1;
00088 
00089         return 0;
00090 }
00091 
00092 static inline int __attribute__ ((always_inline))
00093 timespec_before_or_same(const struct timespec *__restrict t1,
00094                         const struct timespec *__restrict t2)
00095 {
00096         if (t1->tv_sec < t2->tv_sec)
00097                 return 1;
00098 
00099         if (t1->tv_sec == t2->tv_sec &&
00100             t1->tv_nsec <= t2->tv_nsec)
00101                 return 1;
00102 
00103         return 0;
00104 }
00105 
00106 static inline int __attribute__ ((always_inline))
00107 timespec_after(const struct timespec *__restrict t1,
00108                const struct timespec *__restrict t2)
00109 {
00110         return !timespec_before_or_same(t1, t2);
00111 }
00112 
00113 static inline int __attribute__ ((always_inline))
00114 timespec_after_or_same(const struct timespec *__restrict t1,
00115                        const struct timespec *__restrict t2)
00116 {
00117         return !timespec_before(t1, t2);
00118 }
00119

00159 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_COBALT
00160 
00161 #include <asm/xenomai/arith.h>
00162 #include <asm-generic/xenomai/timeconv.h>
00163 
00164 static inline ticks_t clockobj_get_tsc(void)
00165 {
00166         /* Guaranteed to be the source of CLOCK_COPPERPLATE. */
00167         return __xn_rdtsc();
00168 }
00169 
00170 static inline sticks_t clockobj_ns_to_tsc(sticks_t ns)
00171 {
00172         return xnarch_ns_to_tsc(ns);
00173 }
00174 
00175 static inline sticks_t clockobj_tsc_to_ns(sticks_t tsc)
00176 {
00177         return xnarch_tsc_to_ns(tsc);
00178 }
00179 
00180 static inline
00181 void clockobj_ns_to_timespec(ticks_t ns, struct timespec *ts)
00182 {
00183         unsigned long rem;
00184 
00185         ts->tv_sec = xnarch_divrem_billion(ns, &rem);
00186         ts->tv_nsec = rem;
00187 }
00188 
00189 #else /* CONFIG_XENO_MERCURY */
00190 
00191 static inline ticks_t clockobj_get_tsc(void)
00192 {
00193         struct timespec now;
00194         __RT(clock_gettime(CLOCK_COPPERPLATE, &now));
00195         return (ticks_t)now.tv_sec * 1000000000ULL + now.tv_nsec;
00196 }
00197 
00198 static inline sticks_t clockobj_ns_to_tsc(sticks_t ns)
00199 {
00200         return ns;
00201 }
00202 
00203 static inline sticks_t clockobj_tsc_to_ns(sticks_t tsc)
00204 {
00205         return tsc;
00206 }
00207 
00208 static inline
00209 void clockobj_ns_to_timespec(ticks_t ns, struct timespec *ts)
00210 {
00211         ts->tv_sec = ns / 1000000000ULL;
00212         ts->tv_nsec = ns - (ts->tv_sec * 1000000000ULL);
00213 }
00214 
00215 #endif /* CONFIG_XENO_MERCURY */
00216 
00217 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_LORES_CLOCK_DISABLED
00218 
00219 static inline
00220 void __clockobj_ticks_to_timeout(struct clockobj *clkobj,
00221                                  clockid_t clk_id,
00222                                  ticks_t ticks, struct timespec *ts)
00223 {
00224         struct timespec now, delta;
00225 
00226         __RT(clock_gettime(clk_id, &now));
00227         clockobj_ns_to_timespec(ticks, &delta);
00228         timespec_add(ts, &now, &delta);
00229 }
00230 
00231 static inline
00232 void __clockobj_ticks_to_timespec(struct clockobj *clkobj,
00233                                   ticks_t ticks, struct timespec *ts)
00234 {
00235         clockobj_ns_to_timespec(ticks, ts);
00236 }
00237 
00238 static inline
00239 void clockobj_ticks_to_timespec(struct clockobj *clkobj,
00240                                 ticks_t ticks, struct timespec *ts)
00241 {
00242         __clockobj_ticks_to_timespec(clkobj, ticks, ts);
00243 }
00244 
00245 static inline
00246 unsigned int clockobj_get_resolution(struct clockobj *clkobj)
00247 {
00248         return 1;
00249 }
00250 
00251 static inline
00252 unsigned int clockobj_get_frequency(struct clockobj *clkobj)
00253 {
00254         return 1000000000;
00255 }
00256 
00257 static inline sticks_t clockobj_ns_to_ticks(struct clockobj *clkobj,
00258                                             sticks_t ns)
00259 {
00260         return ns;
00261 }
00262 
00263 static inline sticks_t clockobj_ticks_to_ns(struct clockobj *clkobj,
00264                                             sticks_t ticks)
00265 {
00266         return ticks;
00267 }
00268 
00269 #else /* !CONFIG_XENO_LORES_CLOCK_DISABLED */
00270 
00271 void __clockobj_ticks_to_timeout(struct clockobj *clkobj, clockid_t clk_id,
00272                                  ticks_t ticks, struct timespec *ts);
00273 
00274 void __clockobj_ticks_to_timespec(struct clockobj *clkobj,
00275                                   ticks_t ticks, struct timespec *ts);
00276 
00277 static inline
00278 void clockobj_ticks_to_timespec(struct clockobj *clkobj,
00279                                 ticks_t ticks, struct timespec *ts)
00280 {
00281         read_lock_nocancel(&clkobj->lock);
00282         __clockobj_ticks_to_timespec(clkobj, ticks, ts);
00283         read_unlock(&clkobj->lock);
00284 }
00285 
00286 static inline
00287 unsigned int clockobj_get_resolution(struct clockobj *clkobj)
00288 {
00289         return clkobj->resolution;
00290 }
00291 
00292 static inline
00293 unsigned int clockobj_get_frequency(struct clockobj *clkobj)
00294 {
00295         return clkobj->frequency;
00296 }
00297 
00298 sticks_t clockobj_ns_to_ticks(struct clockobj *clkobj,
00299                               sticks_t ns);
00300 
00301 static inline sticks_t clockobj_ticks_to_ns(struct clockobj *clkobj,
00302                                             sticks_t ticks)
00303 {
00304         return ticks * clkobj->resolution;
00305 }
00306 
00307 #endif /* !CONFIG_XENO_LORES_CLOCK_DISABLED */
00308 
00309 static inline
00310 void clockobj_ticks_to_timeout(struct clockobj *clkobj,
00311                                ticks_t ticks, struct timespec *ts)
00312 {
00313         __clockobj_ticks_to_timeout(clkobj, CLOCK_COPPERPLATE, ticks, ts);
00314 }
00315 
00316 #endif /* _COPPERPLATE_CLOCKOBJ_H */
